Jim,
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA - I only waited a year because of computer troubles.  About
this time last year I had PC problems and had to use my son's hand-me-down
computer.  I fixed my regular one (long story - 12 months worth!!) and merged
all the mail files from the other computer, and simply thought that it was a
current posting!!!  I didn't even look at the date, just the info...

Barry Thomas.

The person who made the offer to email the acrobat file chose not post it on the
group file page.  I didn't follow up with him, so I don't know why.  If anyone
has a copy of the file, please post it.

You're a patient fellow to wait a year before prompting.
Jim
